question: Who is set to take charge as the chairman of the World Health Organization (WHO) Executive Board from 2020?
explanation:
Union Health Minister Harsh Vardhan is set to take charge as the chairman of the World Health Organization (WHO) Executive Board.
Harsh Vardhan would succeed the current chairman of WHO Executive Board, Dr Hiroki Nakatani of Japan. The Executive Board of WHO comprises 34 executives related to the field of health, each representing a member country. The Chairmanâ€™s post is held by rotation among the regional groups.
